name: Heroku CI Demo
description: A continuous integration demo app using Node.js and Express 4

scripts.test-setup: cross-env CYPRESS_CACHE_FOLDER=./.cache/Cypress npx cypress cache path && cross-env CYPRESS_CACHE_FOLDER=./.cache/Cypress npx cypress cache list
